QuestData.Title: Magic Message
QuestData.Description: For the last 10,000 years, the elven city of Suramar has been sealed in an arcane barrier, much like Dalaran once was.$B$BThat barrier has come down.$B$BSince then, waves of magical energy have been emanating from the city like ripples in a pond. It was in these waves that I sensed a pattern.$B$BA spell, encrypted among the chaos.$B$BI have recreated the spell here. It's not dangerous, but beyond that... I have no idea what it does!
QuestData.LogDescription: Examine the Arcane Anomaly in Dalaran.
QuestData.CompletionText: Go ahead and take a look.
QuestData.RewardText: A magical message in a bottle, slipped right beneath the Legion's nose... Clever.
